TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Lazy`1<T> extends System.Object
generic <typename T> public ref class Lazy

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 正在延迟初始化的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of object that is being lazily initialized.

summary.span: 提供对延迟初始化的支持。

span.span: Provides support for lazy initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用延迟初始化来延迟创建大型或占用大量资源的对象或执行资源密集型任务，尤其是在此类会创建或执行可能不会出现在程序的生存期内时。Use lazy initialization to defer the creation of a large or resource-intensive object, or the execution of a resource-intensive task, particularly when such creation or execution might not occur during the lifetime of the program. 若要准备迟缓初始化，您创建的实例。To prepare for lazy initialization, you create an instance of . 类型参数你创建的对象指定要延迟初始化的对象的类型。The type argument of the object that you create specifies the type of the object that you want to initialize lazily. 构造函数用来创建对象确定特性的初始化。The constructor that you use to create the object determines the characteristics of the initialization. 首次访问 属性时出现延迟初始化。Lazy initialization occurs the first time the property is accessed. 在大多数情况下，选择一个构造函数取决于两个问题的回答：In most cases, choosing a constructor depends on your answers to two questions: - 将从多个线程访问的延迟初始化的对象？Will the lazily initialized object be accessed from more than one thread? 如果是这样，对象可能在任何线程上创建它。If so, the object might create it on any thread. 可以使用其默认行为是创建一个线程安全的简单构造函数之一对象，因此只有一个实例的延迟实例化的对象创建无论多少线程尝试访问它。You can use one of the simple constructors whose default behavior is to create a thread-safe object, so that only one instance of the lazily instantiated object is created no matter how many threads try to access it. 若要创建不是线程安全的对象，必须使用的构造函数，可用于指定不具有线程安全性。To create a object that is not thread safe, you must use a constructor that enables you to specify no thread safety. > [!CAUTION] > 使对象线程安全不会保护延迟初始化的对象。Making the object thread safe does not protect the lazily initialized object. 如果多个线程可以访问的延迟初始化的对象，其属性和方法必须进行安全的多线程访问。If multiple threads can access the lazily initialized object, you must make its properties and methods safe for multithreaded access. - 迟缓初始化是否需要大量的代码，或延迟初始化的对象是否具有执行所有操作需要和不会引发异常的默认构造函数？Does lazy initialization require a lot of code, or does the lazily initialized object have a default constructor that does everything you need and doesn't throw exceptions? 如果您需要自己编写初始化代码或异常需要进行处理，使用采用的工厂方法的构造函数之一。If you need to write initialization code or if exceptions need to be handled, use one of the constructors that takes a factory method. 工厂方法中编写初始化代码。Write your initialization code in the factory method. 下表显示了哪个构造函数来选择，基于这两个因素：The following table shows which constructor to choose, based on these two factors: |将访问对象Object will be accessed by|如果不不需要任何初始化代码 （默认构造函数） 使用If no initialization code is required (default constructor), use|如果需要初始化代码，使用If initialization code is required, use| |--------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |多个线程Multiple threads||| |一个线程One thread| 与`isThreadSafe`设置为`false`。 with `isThreadSafe` set to `false`.| 与`isThreadSafe`设置为`false`。 with `isThreadSafe` set to `false`.| 可以使用 lambda 表达式来指定的工厂方法。You can use a lambda expression to specify the factory method. 这会将所有初始化代码都保持在一个位置。This keeps all the initialization code in one place. Lambda 表达式捕获的上下文，包括向延迟初始化的对象的构造函数传递任何参数。The lambda expression captures the context, including any arguments you pass to the lazily initialized object's constructor. **异常缓存**时使用工厂方法时，会缓存异常。**Exception caching** When you use factory methods, exceptions are cached. 也就是说，如果工厂方法将引发异常的第一次一个线程尝试访问属性的对象，每个后续尝试引发相同的异常。That is, if the factory method throws an exception the first time a thread tries to access the property of the object, the same exception is thrown on every subsequent attempt. 这可确保每次调用属性生成相同的结果，并可避免不同的线程获得不同的结果时可能引发的细微错误。This ensures that every call to the property produces the same result and avoids subtle errors that might arise if different threads get different results. 代表实际`T`，否则会初始化后在某些较早的时候，通常在启动过程。The stands in for an actual `T` that otherwise would have been initialized at some earlier point, usually during startup. 通常严重故障时该早时间点。A failure at that earlier point is usually fatal. 如果恢复失败的可能，我们建议构建重试逻辑 （在此情况下，在工厂方法），初始化例程到，只需像未在使用延迟初始化。If there is a potential for a recoverable failure, we recommend that you build the retry logic into the initialization routine (in this case, the factory method), just as you would if you weren’t using lazy initialization. **替代锁定**在某些情况下，你可能想要避免产生的开销对象的默认锁定行为。**Alternative to locking** In certain situations, you might want to avoid the overhead of the object's default locking behavior. 在极少数情况下，可能会潜在死锁。In rare situations, there might be a potential for deadlocks. 在这种情况下，可以使用或构造函数，并指定。In such cases, you can use the or constructor, and specify . 这使得对象来创建延迟初始化对象的副本在每个多个线程上，如果线程调用属性同时。This enables the object to create a copy of the lazily initialized object on each of several threads if the threads call the property simultaneously. 对象，可以确保所有线程使用延迟初始化对象的相同实例，并放弃未使用的实例。The object ensures that all threads use the same instance of the lazily initialized object and discards the instances that are not used. 因此，减少锁定开销的成本是您的程序有时可能会创建和丢弃的高开销对象的额外副本。Thus, the cost of reducing the locking overhead is that your program might sometimes create and discard extra copies of an expensive object. 在大多数情况下，这是不可能。In most cases, this is unlikely. 有关示例和构造函数演示此行为。The examples for the and constructors demonstrate this behavior. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当指定，永远不会缓存异常，即使您指定的工厂方法。When you specify , exceptions are never cached, even if you specify a factory method. **等效的构造函数**除了允许使用，则和构造函数可以复制其他构造函数的功能。**Equivalent constructors** In addition to enabling the use of , the and constructors can duplicate the functionality of the other constructors. 下表显示了生成等效的行为的参数值。The following table shows the parameter values that produce equivalent behavior. |若要创建对象，该对象To create a object that is|对于具有的构造函数`LazyThreadSafetyMode``mode`参数，设置`mode`到For constructors that have a `LazyThreadSafetyMode` `mode` parameter, set `mode` to|对于具有一个布尔值的构造函数`isThreadSafe`参数，设置`isThreadSafe`到For constructors that have a Boolean `isThreadSafe` parameter, set `isThreadSafe` to|对于不带任何线程安全性参数的构造函数For constructors with no thread safety parameters| |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| |完全线程安全;使用以下锁定确保只有一个线程初始化的值。Fully thread safe; uses locking to ensure that only one thread initializes the value.||`true`|所有此类构造函数是完全线程安全的。All such constructors are fully thread safe.| |非线程安全。Not thread safe.||`false`|不适用。Not applicable.| |完全线程安全;线程争用来初始化的值。Fully thread safe; threads race to initialize the value.||不适用。Not applicable.|不适用。Not applicable.| **其他功能**有关的使用信息使用线程静态字段或属性的后备存储，请参阅[迟缓初始化](~/docs/framework/performance/lazy-initialization.md)。**Other capabilities** For information about the use of with thread-static fields, or as the backing store for properties, see [Lazy Initialization](~/docs/framework/performance/lazy-initialization.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将类以提供从多个线程访问迟缓初始化。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to provide lazy initialization with access from multiple threads. > [!NOTE] > 该示例使用构造函数。The example uses the constructor. 它还演示如何使用构造函数 (指定`true`有关`isThreadSafe`) 和构造函数 (指定为`mode`)。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`) and the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切换到不同的构造函数，只需更改的构造函数已被注释掉。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructors are commented out. > > 有关演示异常的示例，缓存使用的相同的构造函数，请参阅构造函数。For an example that demonstrates exception caching using the same constructors, see the constructor. 此示例定义一个将由多个线程之一延迟初始化的 `LargeObject` 类。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 代码的四个主要部分说明的初始值设定项、 工厂方法，实际的初始化和的构造函数创建`LargeObject`类，该类创建对象时显示一条消息。The four key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the factory method, the actual initialization, and the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which displays a message when the object is created. 在 `Main` 方法的开头，该示例为 `LargeObject` 创建线程安全的延迟初始值: At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 工厂方法演示如何创建对象，其占位符用于进一步初始化：The factory method shows the creation of the object, with a placeholder for further initialization: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#factoryfunc)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#factoryfunc)] 请注意前, 两个代码部分可以组合使用 lambda 函数中，如下所示：Note that the first two code sections could be combined by using a lambda function, as shown here: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#InitWithLambda](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/lambda.cs#initwithlambda)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#InitWithLambda](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/lambda.vb#initwithlambda)] 该示例暂停，以指示延迟初始化发生之前，可能需要一个不确定的时间段。The example pauses, to indicate that an indeterminate period may elapse before lazy initialization occurs. 当您按下**Enter**密钥，该示例创建并启动三个线程。When you press the **Enter** key, the example creates and starts three threads. `ThreadProc`方法，由所有三个线程调用属性。The `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads calls the property. 第一次发生这种情况，`LargeObject`创建实例：The first time this happens, the `LargeObject` instance is created: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 构造函数`LargeObject`类，其中包含代码的最后一个关键部分，显示一条消息，并记录正在初始化的线程的标识。The constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which includes the last key section of code, displays a message and records the identity of the initializing thread. 程序的输出将显示完整代码列表的末尾。The output from the program appears at the end of the full code listing. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#largector)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#largector)] > [!NOTE] > 为简单起见，此示例使用 的全局实例，所有方法都是 `static` (在 Visual Basic 中`Shared` )。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 使用延迟初始化没有要求。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#all)]

threadsafe.span: 默认情况下的所有公共和受保护成员类都是线程安全的可能从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: By default, all public and protected members of the class are thread safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: （可选） 和每个实例，使用该类型的构造函数的参数，则可能会删除这些线程安全性保证。

span.span: These thread-safety guarantees may be removed optionally and per instance, using parameters to the type's constructors.
Lazy Initialization

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 当发生延迟初始化时，使用目标类型的默认构造函数。

span.span: When lazy initialization occurs, the default constructor of the target type is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建一个实例可能从多个线程同时使用。An instance that is created with this constructor may be used concurrently from multiple threads. 线程安全模式的使用此构造函数初始化的实例是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is . 线程安全模式介绍多个线程尝试初始化时的行为实例。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 一个使用此构造函数创建的实例不会缓存异常。A instance that is created with this constructor does not cache exceptions. 有关更多信息，请参见 类或 枚举。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 它还演示如何使用构造函数 (指定`true`有关`isThreadSafe`) 和构造函数 (指定为`mode`)。It also illustrates the use of the constructor (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`) and the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切换到不同的构造函数，只需更改的构造函数已被注释掉。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructors are commented out. 此示例定义一个将由多个线程之一延迟初始化的 `LargeObject` 类。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 在此示例中的两个关键代码行是代码的在创建的初始值设定项和实际初始化。The two key lines of code in this example are the creation of the initializer and the actual initialization. 在 `Main` 方法的开头，该示例为 `LargeObject` 创建线程安全的延迟初始值: At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 该示例创建并启动三个线程的阻止对象，以便该示例可以一次性全部释放线程。The example creates and starts three threads that block on a object, so that the example can release the threads all at once. `ThreadProc`方法，由所有三个线程调用属性获取`LargeObject`实例：The `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads calls the property to get the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 类提供锁定，以便只有一个线程允许创建`LargeObject`实例。The class provides locking, so that only one thread is allowed to create the `LargeObject` instance. 该示例演示所有线程均都获得同一实例。The example demonstrates that the other threads all get the same instance. > [!NOTE] > 为简单起见，此示例使用 的全局实例，所有方法都是 `static` (在 Visual Basic 中`Shared` )。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 使用延迟初始化没有要求。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/vb/example.vb#all)]

param.name: isThreadSafe
param.span: 表示此示例可由多个线程同时使用； 表示此实例一次只能由一个线程使用。

span.span: to make this instance usable concurrently by multiple threads; to make the instance usable by only one thread at a time.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 当延迟初始化发生时，将使用目标类型的默认构造函数和指定初始化模式。

span.span: When lazy initialization occurs, the default constructor of the target type and the specified initialization mode are used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 线程安全模式的使用此构造函数初始化的实例是如果`isThreadSafe`是`true`; 否则为该模式是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is if `isThreadSafe` is `true`; otherwise, the mode is . 线程安全模式介绍多个线程尝试初始化时的行为实例。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 若要指定模式下，使用或构造函数。To specify the mode, use the or constructor. 一个使用此构造函数创建的实例不会缓存异常。A instance that is created with this constructor does not cache exceptions. 有关更多信息，请参见 类或 枚举。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将此构造函数可创建不是线程安全的适合对延迟初始化对象的所有访问都发生在同一线程上的延迟初始值设定项。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to create a lazy initializer that is not thread safe, for scenarios where all access to the lazily initialized object occurs on the same thread. 它还演示如何使用构造函数 (指定为`mode`。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying for `mode`. 若要切换到不同的构造函数，只需更改哪个构造函数已被注释掉。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructor is commented out. > [!NOTE] > 有关演示如何在多线程方案中使用此构造函数的代码 (指定`true`有关`isThreadSafe`)，有关示例，请参阅构造函数。For code that demonstrates how to use this constructor in multithreaded scenarios (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`), see the example for the constructor. 该示例定义了`LargeObject`将延迟初始化的类。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily. 在中`Main`方法，该示例创建实例然后暂停。In the `Main` method, the example creates a instance and then pauses. 当您按下**Enter**键，该示例访问属性的实例，这会导致发生的初始化。When you press the **Enter** key, the example accesses the property of the instance, which causes initialization to occur. 构造函数`LargeObject`类将显示一条控制台消息。The constructor of the `LargeObject` class displays a console message. > [!NOTE] > 为简单起见，此示例使用 的全局实例，所有方法都是 `static` (在 Visual Basic 中`Shared` )。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 使用延迟初始化没有要求。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorBool#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorbool/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorBool#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorbool/vb/example.vb#all)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建一个实例可能从多个线程同时使用。An instance that is created with this constructor may be used concurrently from multiple threads. 线程安全模式的使用此构造函数初始化的实例是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is . 线程安全模式介绍多个线程尝试初始化时的行为实例。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 引发的异常`valueFactory`缓存。Exceptions that are thrown by `valueFactory` are cached. 有关更多信息，请参见 类或 枚举。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将此构造函数可提供与异常缓存延迟初始化。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to provide lazy initialization with exception caching. 它还演示如何使用构造函数 (指定`true`有关`isThreadSafe`) 和构造函数 (指定为`mode`)。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`) and the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切换到不同的构造函数，只需更改的构造函数已被注释掉。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructors are commented out. 此示例定义一个将由多个线程之一延迟初始化的 `LargeObject` 类。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 代码的三个主要部分说明的初始值设定项、 实际的初始化和的构造函数创建`LargeObject`类，该示例演示了异常缓存。The three key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, and the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which demonstrates exception caching. 在 `Main` 方法的开头，该示例为 `LargeObject` 创建线程安全的延迟初始值: At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 该示例创建并启动三个线程。The example creates and starts three threads. `ThreadProc`方法，由所有三个线程调用属性获取`LargeObject`实例：The `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads calls the property to get the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 中的构造函数`LargeObject`类，代码的第三个关键部分将引发异常的第一个时间`LargeObject`实例创建后，但此后允许创建实例发生：In the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, the third key section of code throws an exception the first time a `LargeObject` instance is created, but thereafter allows instance creation to occur: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#largector)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#largector)] 运行示例时，尝试创建的实例的第一个线程`LargeObject`捕获将失败，并且该异常。When the example is run, the first thread that tries to create an instance of `LargeObject` fails, and the exception is caught. 您所料下, 一个线程会成功创建实例，但对象已缓存了异常。You might expect that the next thread would successfully create an instance, but the object has cached the exception. 因此，所有三个线程引发的异常。Because of this, all three threads throw the exception. > [!NOTE] > 为简单起见，此示例使用 的全局实例，所有方法都是 `static` (在 Visual Basic 中`Shared` )。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 使用延迟初始化没有要求。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#all)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode mode) cil managed

param.name: mode
param.span: 一个枚举值，用于指定线程安全模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the thread safety mode.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，其中使用 的默认构造函数和指定的线程安全性模式。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the default constructor of and the specified thread-safety mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 线程安全模式的实例描述的行为，当多个线程尝试初始化实例。The thread safety mode of a instance describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 一个使用此构造函数创建的实例不会缓存异常。A instance that is created with this constructor does not cache exceptions. 有关更多信息，请参见 类或 枚举。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将此构造函数以创建允许多个线程争相延迟创建对象的延迟初始值设定项。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to create a lazy initializer that enables multiple threads to race to create an object lazily. 多个线程可能会成功地创建实例，但所有线程都使用首次创建的实例。Multiple threads might succeed in creating instances, but all threads use the instance that was created first. > [!NOTE] > 有关示例，演示如何在单线程方案中使用此构造函数 (指定有关`mode`)，请参阅构造函数。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor in single-threaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 有关示例，演示如何使用此构造函数提供锁定而不多线程方案中的争用条件 (指定有关`mode`)，请参阅构造函数。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor to provide locking instead of race conditions in multithreaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 该示例定义了`LargeObject`将由多个线程的任何延迟初始化的类。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by any of several threads. 代码的三个主要部分说明了初始值设定项、 和的创建实际的初始化，构造函数和终结器的`LargeObject`类。The three key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, and the constructor and finalizer of the `LargeObject` class. 在开头`Main`方法，该示例将创建执行的延迟初始化对象`LargeObject`:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the object that performs lazy initialization of the `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 该示例创建并启动三个线程的阻止对象，以便该示例可以一次性全部释放线程。The example creates and starts three threads that block on a object, so that the example can release the threads all at once. 在中`ThreadProc`方法，由所有三个线程，调用属性所产生的`LargeObject`实例：In the `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads, calling the property creates the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 因为的构造函数指定的实例，允许所有三个线程的创建`LargeObject`实例。Because the constructor for the instance specified , all three threads are allowed to create `LargeObject` instances. 通过在构造函数和终结器的显示控制台消息的示例演示这`LargeObject`类：The example demonstrates this by displaying console messages in the constructor and in the finalizer of the `LargeObject` class: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#ctorfinalizer)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#ctorfinalizer)] 但是，对象可确保只有一个实例使用的所有线程。However, the object ensures that only one instance is used by all threads. 该示例的输出显示了所有三个线程使用同一个实例，同时还显示其他两个实例可以被垃圾回收。The output from the example shows that all three threads use the same instance, and also shows that the other two instances can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 为简单起见，此示例使用 的全局实例，所有方法都是 `static` (在 Visual Basic 中`Shared` )。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 使用延迟初始化没有要求。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#all)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 线程安全模式的使用此构造函数初始化的实例是如果`isThreadSafe`是`true`; 否则为该模式是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is if `isThreadSafe` is `true`; otherwise, the mode is . 线程安全模式介绍多个线程尝试初始化时的行为实例。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 若要指定模式下，使用或构造函数。To specify the mode, use the or constructor. 引发的异常`valueFactory`缓存。Exceptions that are thrown by `valueFactory` are cached. 有关更多信息，请参见 类或 枚举。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将此构造函数可与异常缓存，在方案中使用单个线程提供迟缓初始化。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to provide lazy initialization with exception caching, in a scenario with a single thread. 它还演示如何使用构造函数 (指定为`mode`)。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切换到该构造函数，只需更改哪个构造函数已被注释掉。To switch to that constructor, just change which constructor is commented out. > [!NOTE] > 有关演示如何在多线程方案中使用此构造函数的代码 (指定`true`有关`isThreadSafe`)，有关示例，请参阅构造函数。For code that demonstrates how to use this constructor in multithreaded scenarios (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`), see the example for the constructor. 此示例定义一个将由多个线程之一延迟初始化的 `LargeObject` 类。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 代码的三个主要部分说明的初始值设定项、 实际的初始化和的构造函数创建`LargeObject`类，该示例演示了异常缓存。The three key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, and the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which demonstrates exception caching. 在 `Main` 方法的开头，该示例为 `LargeObject` 创建线程安全的延迟初始值: At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 在构造函数中，调用`isThreadSafe`参数是`false`，因此不是线程安全。In the call to the constructor, the `isThreadSafe` parameter is `false`, so the is not thread safe. 因为它不是线程安全，该示例将调用三次在同一线程上的属性：Because it's not thread safe, the example calls the property three times on the same thread: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 中的构造函数`LargeObject`类，代码的第三个关键部分将引发异常的第一个时间`LargeObject`实例创建后，但此后允许创建实例发生：In the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, the third key section of code throws an exception the first time a `LargeObject` instance is created, but thereafter allows instance creation to occur: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#largector)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#largector)] 运行示例时，第一次尝试创建的实例`LargeObject`捕获将失败，并且该异常。When the example is run, the first attempt to create an instance of `LargeObject` fails, and the exception is caught. 您所料下, 一次尝试都会成功，但对象已缓存了异常。You might expect that the next attempt would succeed, but the object has cached the exception. 因此，所有三个尝试引发的异常。Because of this, all three attempts throw the exception. > [!NOTE] > 为简单起见，此示例使用 的全局实例，所有方法都是 `static` (在 Visual Basic 中`Shared` )。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 使用延迟初始化没有要求。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#all)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，其中使用指定的初始化函数和线程安全性模式。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the specified initialization function and thread-safety mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 线程安全模式的实例描述的行为，当多个线程尝试初始化实例。The thread safety mode of a instance describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 引发的异常`valueFactory`缓存，除非`mode`是。Exceptions that are thrown by `valueFactory` are cached, unless `mode` is . 有关更多信息，请参见 类或 枚举。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将此构造函数以创建允许多个线程争相延迟创建对象的延迟初始值设定项。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to create a lazy initializer that enables multiple threads to race to create an object lazily. 多个线程可能会成功地创建实例，但所有线程都使用首次创建的实例。Multiple threads might succeed in creating instances, but all threads use the instance that was created first. 此外，该示例演示指定时，永远不会缓存异常，即使由函数而不是惰式创建的类型的默认构造函数通过执行初始化。In addition, the example demonstrates that exceptions are never cached when you specify , even if initialization is performed by a function instead of by the default constructor of the lazily created type. > [!NOTE] > 有关示例，演示如何在单线程方案中使用此构造函数 (指定有关`mode`)，请参阅构造函数。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor in single-threaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 有关示例，演示如何使用此构造函数提供锁定而不多线程方案中的争用条件 (指定有关`mode`)，请参阅构造函数。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor to provide locking instead of race conditions in multithreaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 该示例定义了`LargeObject`将由多个线程的任何延迟初始化的类。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by any of several threads. 代码的四个主要部分说明的初始值设定项、 实际初始化、 初始化函数和构造函数创建和终结器的`LargeObject`类。The four key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, the initialization function, and the constructor and finalizer of the `LargeObject` class. 在开头`Main`方法，该示例将创建执行的延迟初始化对象`LargeObject`:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the object that performs lazy initialization of the `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 延迟初始值设定项使用一个函数来执行初始化。The lazy initializer uses a function to perform the initialization. 在这种情况下，函数是必需的因为没有默认构造函数`LargeObject`类。In this case, a function is required because there is no default constructor for the `LargeObject` class. 该示例创建并启动三个线程的阻止对象，以便该示例可以一次性全部释放线程。The example creates and starts three threads that block on a object, so that the example can release the threads all at once. 在中`ThreadProc`方法，由所有三个线程，调用属性所产生的`LargeObject`实例：In the `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads, calling the property creates the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 在代码的第三个关键部分，延迟初始化函数调用以创建`LargeObject`实例。In the third key section of code, the lazy initialization function is called to create the `LargeObject` instance. 该函数将引发异常的第一次调用时：The function throws an exception the first time it's called: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#factoryfunc)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#factoryfunc)] 与任何其他设置，就会缓存初始化函数中未经处理的异常。With any other setting, an unhandled exception in the initialization function would be cached. 但是，禁止显示异常缓存。However, suppresses exception caching. 示例输出演示的后续尝试将对象初始化成功。The output from the example demonstrates that a subsequent attempt to initialize the object succeeds. > [!NOTE] > 通常，该值指示其他线程已成功初始化该对象的消息后，会显示异常消息。The exception message usually appears after messages indicating that other threads have successfully initialized the object. 这是因为引入引发和捕获异常的延迟。This is because of the delay introduced by throwing and catching the exception. 因为的构造函数指定的实例，允许所有三个线程的创建`LargeObject`实例。Because the constructor for the instance specified , all three threads are allowed to create `LargeObject` instances. 通过在构造函数和终结器的显示控制台消息的示例演示这`LargeObject`类：The example demonstrates this by displaying console messages in the constructor and in the finalizer of the `LargeObject` class: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#ctorfinalizer)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#ctorfinalizer)] 对象可确保只有一个实例使用的所有线程 （除了其中的初始化函数将引发异常的线程）。The object ensures that only one instance is used by all threads (except the thread where the initialization function throws an exception). 示例输出演示了这一点。The output from the example shows this. > [!NOTE] > 为简单起见，此示例使用 的全局实例，所有方法都是 `static` (在 Visual Basic 中`Shared` )。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 使用延迟初始化没有要求。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#all)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已为此 实例创建一个值。

value.span: 如果已为此 实例创建了一个值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a value has been created for this instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当延迟初始化发生实例，它可能会导致引发异常或正在创建的值。When lazy initialization occurs for a instance, it may result in either a value being created or an exception being thrown. 如果异常则引发该异常，后续的行为的实例取决于异常缓存是否有效。If an exception is thrown, subsequent behavior of the instance depends on whether exception caching is in effect. 如果实例已通过使用构造函数不指定初始化函数，则异常缓存不起作用。If the instance was created by using a constructor that does not specify an initialization function, then exception caching is not in effect. 若要初始化的后续尝试可能会成功，且成功初始化后属性返回`true`。A subsequent attempt to initialize the might succeed, and after successful initialization the property returns `true`. 如果与初始化函数创建实例 (通过指定`valueFactory`参数的构造函数)，然后异常缓存控制的线程安全模式。If the instance was created with an initialization function (specified by the `valueFactory` parameter of the constructor), then exception caching is controlled by the thread safety mode. - 如果模式为或，则没有第二次机会来初始化实例。If the mode is or , there is no second chance to initialize the instance. 如果发生了异常，但在初始化函数中未经处理，该异常将缓存并在后续访问再次引发属性。If an exception occurs and is unhandled in the initialization function, that exception is cached and rethrown on subsequent accesses of the property. 如果引发异常，因此，在这种情况下，不创建任何值返回`false`。No value is created if an exception is thrown, so in such cases returns `false`. - 如果模式为，成功运行初始化函数 （或默认构造函数） 中的第一个线程创建的值为实例。If the mode is , the first thread that succeeds in running the initialization function (or the default constructor) creates the value for the instance. 如果初始化函数在一个线程上引发了异常，其他线程仍可以尝试初始化实例。If the initialization function throws an exception on one thread, other threads can still try to initialize the instance. 创建值，直到属性返回`false`。Until the value is created, the property returns `false`.

span.span: Lazy Initialization

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 创建并返回此实例的 属性的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Creates and returns a string representation of the property for this instance.

returns.span: 如果已创建该值（即，如果 属性返回 ），则为对此实例的 属性调用 方法所获得的结果。

span.span: The result of calling the method on the property for this instance, if the value has been created (that is, if the property returns ).

returns.span: 否则，则为一个指示该值尚未创建的字符串。

span.span: Otherwise, a string indicating that the value has not been created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法不会导致初始化。Calling this method does not cause initialization. 属性可以是`null`后迟缓初始化工厂方法是否为指定`valueFactory`参数， ，或构造函数将返回`null`。The property can be `null` after lazy initialization if the factory method that was specified for the `valueFactory` parameter of the , , or constructor returns `null`.

span.span: The property is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As T
public: property T Value { T get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 实例的延迟初始化值。

span.span: Gets the lazily initialized value of the current instance.

value.span: 当前 实例的延迟初始化值。

span.span: The lazily initialized value of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`false`，则访问属性强制初始化。If the property is `false`, accessing the property forces initialization. 除了所列出的异常属性可能会引发由传递给工厂方法引发的任何未处理的异常`valueFactory`的参数， ，或构造函数。In addition to the exceptions that are listed, the property can throw any unhandled exception that is thrown by the factory method that was passed to the `valueFactory` parameter of the , , or constructor.

exception.span: 实例初始化为使用正在延迟初始化的类型的默认构造函数，并且缺少访问该构造函数的权限。

span.span: The instance is initialized to use the default constructor of the type that is being lazily initialized, and permissions to access the constructor are missing.

exception.span: 实例初始化为使用正在惰性初始化的类型的默认构造函数，并且该类型没有无参数的公共构造函数。

span.span: The instance is initialized to use the default constructor of the type that is being lazily initialized, and that type does not have a public, parameterless constructor.

exception.span: 初始化函数尝试访问此实例上的 。

span.span: The initialization function tries to access on this instance.
Lazy Initialization
